body.name: FREY Laundry Detergent, Sandalwood Scent, 16-Ounce Bottle, 40 Dryer Sheets
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 8 hrs 4 mins
Or fastest pickup Tomorrow, February 15. Order within 6 hrs 34 mins
features: ✨ ELEVATE YOUR LAUNDRY GAME: Elevate your laundry routine with FREY's top-rated fragrance that brings a touch of luxury to every wash. Infused with a symphony of over a dozen individual scents, our liquid laundry soap, fabric softener sheets, and fabric conditioner transform your clothes into a captivating sensory experience.

🌸 IMMERSE IN SOFTNESS AND FRESHNESS: Indulge in the perfect combination of FREY's laundry essentials for an unparalleled laundry experience. Revel in the softness and freshness that our washing liquid, fabric dryer sheets, and fabric softener infuse into your fabrics, turning every wash into a delightful symphony of scent and comfort.

⏳ ENJOY LONG-LASTING FRESHNESS: FREY's Complete Package ensures you're equipped for a marathon of marvelous laundry moments. With a substantial 16-ounce bottle of laundry cleanser, another 16-ounce bottle of fabric conditioner, and a generous pack of 30 dryer softener sheets, your laundry routine is poised for enduring freshness that stands the test of time.

🌿 GENTLE CARE FOR SENSITIVE SKIN: Experience laundry care that pampers even the most sensitive skin. Our revolutionary natural formulas are meticulously crafted without the harsh ingredients known to trigger skin irritation. With FREY, you can indulge in the luxury of fragrant fabrics without compromising on skin comfort.

🌟 FRAGRANCE AND FUNCTIONALITY UNITE: Embrace the FREY brand's commitment to combining captivating fragrances with impeccable functionality. Elevate your laundry experience with a brand that understands the art of scent, cares for your skin, and transforms your everyday chore into a luxurious ritual.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Amazing product, smells so good! And the scent lasts a long time! Love this product, love the customer service! Would recommend this product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Clothes are really clean, it is a true value for the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars No scent left on clean clothes
reviews.reviewText: I had previously used some sample sizes of various Frey detergents, and I decided to order this one (Sandalwood/Bergamot/Clove). Unlike the detergent samples I used in the past, this left zero lingering scent on my sheets, and the lingering fragrance was my *entire reason* for purchasing. You would think that the combination of detergent, fabric softener, and a dryer sheet would leave the scent, but no. Nada. Nothing. And for fifty bucks, I can't justify keeping it.Also the pump dispenser on the fabric softener wouldn't pop up, so I had to guess what the appropriate amount was and pour it in.Overall - Super disappointed. I don't know if something changed since I got samples a few years ago? But beware if you're looking for a lingering warm scent on your laundry. This isn't the product for you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Disaster pumps and bottles...
reviews.reviewText: The black and white design it was better.Both pumps broke during opening.I hope coming back the old design

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Believed all the good reviews, but a complete disappointment.
reviews.reviewText: Purchased the triple combo.. came with detergent, liquid fabric softener, and dryer sheets all in Sandalwood Scent. Been trying to find if there are any laundry detergents out there that can compete with Tyler Candle Company (as for as how pleasant the scent is, strength of the scent, and how long lasting it is). Frey Sandalwood, as excited as I was to try it based on reviews, it is a 110% let down. The scent inside the containers is wonderful but that doesn't matter if it doesn't transfer to the clothing. I have washed and dried 3 loads of clothing using up to 10x pumps of Frey Sandalwood detergent and softener while also using up to 2x dryer sheets per load. You can easily smell the scent through that area of the house while washing and drying..... HOWEVER... directly after being dried, all 3 loads of laundry you can bury your face so hard into, almost to the point of suffocation and the only scent you can smell is the insides of your nostrils. I can't even fathom how that's possible honestly. What very little scent that does exists, is like dirty water. Tyler Candle Company's scents Diva and Kathina so much more worth your money. Their scents are unmatched and can last months on end with certain laundry items. Frey, why does the scent just vanish?!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 18, 2020
reviews.reviewText: I love these products. They smell great and keep my clothes feeling light and clean. It’s a little pricey but it’s worth it to me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great scent! Messy packaging
reviews.reviewText: I’ve loved the Frey brand the scent is wonderful and lasts longer than other detergents. However the packaging sucked! Sucked so bad I need a refund. It had been opened because it was a mess and all over the place (check pics) the dryer sheet boxes had already been opened too!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The scent boosters are worth the money but the dryer sheets not so much.
reviews.reviewText: I’d highly recommend purchasing the scent booster concentrate for your wash. I wash it with the Tide PureClean (Honey Lavender Scent). You get a great clean and the scent from the FREY overpowers the honey lavender. It smells great, but I wouldn’t recommend paying extra for the dryer sheets! Best used as a scent booster!
